title: SubC

content.no: SubC er et gratis analog subbass lydbibliotek for Decent Sampler med triangelbølgeoscillator fra en [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) sent gjennom forskjellige forvrengningskretser og effekter.
content.en: SubC is a free analog sub bass sample library for DecentSampler featuring a [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) triangle wave oscillator ran through different saturation circuits and effects.

thumbnailDescription: SubC user interface inside a wooden synthesizer case

title: 4-track Toy Piano

content.no:
Et [Kalikå Leksakspiano (toy piano)](equipment/instruments/kalikaa-leksakspiano/) spilt inn på kassett og spilt av på halv hastighet og normal/original hastighet.
Biblioteket inkluderer også impulsresponser for to typer båndekko og to typer romklang.
content.en:
A [Kalikå Leksakspiano (toy piano)](equipment/instruments/kalikaa-leksakspiano/) recorded on to cassette tape and played back at half speed and normal/original speed. Playing back at half speed results in an octave lower pitch.
It also includes impulse responses for two tape delay/echo types and two room reverbs.

thumbnailDescription: The 4-track Toy Piano user interface and a Kalikå Leksakspiano (toy piano)

title: Elektrisk Salmesykkel

content.no: Elektrisk Salmesykkel er et gratis lydbibliotek for Decent Sampler som inneholder lyder fra et [Yamaha L-20D elektrisk harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) med noen ekstra funksjoner.
content.en: Elektrisk Salmesykkel is a free sample library for Decent Sampler featuring the [Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) with some added features.

thumbnailDescription: Elektrisk Salmesykkel user interface inside a Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium case
